info.title: NovaDB CMS API
info.description: An API to perform read/write operations on NovaDB data.

get.summary: Get a single branch by ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The branch ID, Guid or ApiIdentifier

parameters.name: attributes
parameters.description: A comma separated list of object IDs, Guids or ApiIdentifiers to filter down values by attributes

parameters.name: variants
parameters.description: A comma separated list of object IDs, Guids or ApiIdentifiers to filter down values by variants

parameters.name: languages
parameters.description: A comma separated list of object IDs, Guids or ApiIdentifiers to filter down values by languages

304.description: The content has not been modified

404.description: The branch or object could not be found

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The branch ID, Guid or ApiIdentifier

parameters.name: X-CmsApi-Username
parameters.description: The username this transaction is committed for. This must be set for internal access, otherwise, the transaction will be committed as the user who is currently logged in.

requestBody.description: The object to update. Either an ID or a Guid must be provided for the object.

404.description: The branch could not be found

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The branch ID, Guid or ApiIdentifier

parameters.name: X-CmsApi-Username
parameters.description: The username this transaction is committed for. This must be set for internal access, otherwise, the transaction will be committed as the user who is currently logged in.

404.description: The branch or object could not be found

parameters.name: X-CmsApi-Username
parameters.description: The username this transaction is committed for. This must be set for internal access, otherwise, the transaction will be committed as the user who is currently logged in.

requestBody.description: The model describing the branch to create

get.summary: Get generated class implementation for all objects with API identifiers

parameters.name: branch
parameters.description: The branch ID or ApiIdentifier

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The programming language of the generated code

parameters.name: ids
parameters.description: A comma separated list of object type IDs, Guids or ApiIdentifiers or "all" for all custom object types that have an API Identifier

get.summary: Get a c# class for a specific object type

parameters.name: branch
parameters.description: The branch ID or ApiIdentifier

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: The programming language of the generated code

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The object type ID or ApiIdentifier

parameters.name: X-CmsApi-Username
parameters.description: The username this transaction is committed for. This must be set for internal access, otherwise, the transaction will be committed as the user who is currently logged in.

requestBody.description: The model describing the comment that shall be created.

404.description: The branch or the object could not be found

get.summary: Get multiple comments, sorted by id, descending.

parameters.name: branchRef
parameters.description: The id of the branch.

parameters.name: objectRef
parameters.description: The id of object the comment refers to.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: The user who wrote the comment. If not null, only comments created by the specified user will be included.

parameters.name: isDeleted
parameters.description: If true, include only deleted, if false include only not-deleted, if null include all comments.

parameters.name: continue
parameters.description: An opaque token that encapsulates information how to continue the list request

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: The number of comments to take.

404.description: The branch or the comment could not be found.

get.summary: Get a single comment by ID

parameters.name: commentId
parameters.description: The comment's ID.

404.description: The branch or the comment could not be found.

parameters.name: commentId
parameters.description: The comment's id.

parameters.name: X-CmsApi-Username
parameters.description: The username this transaction is committed for. This must be set for internal access, otherwise, the transaction will be committed as the user who is currently logged in.

404.description: The comment could not be found

parameters.name: commentId
parameters.description: The comment id.

parameters.name: X-CmsApi-Username
parameters.description: The username this transaction is committed for. This must be set for internal access, otherwise, the transaction will be committed as the user who is currently logged in.

404.description: The comment was not found or it is deleted.

get.summary: Retrieve the file with the specified name.
get.description: Retrieve the file with the specified name.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Name of the file including the extension.

parameters.name: range
parameters.description: Range header value. For more information, visit https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Headers/Range

404.description: File Not Found

422.description: The file size is larger than expected.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: The token of the temporary file.

422.description: The file size is larger than expected.

delete.summary: Delete the temporary file using the provided token.
delete.description: Delete the temporary file using the provided token.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: Token for the temporary file to delete (including extension).

parameters.name: X-CmsApi-Username
parameters.description: The username this transaction is committed for. This must be set for internal access, otherwise, the transaction will be committed as the user who is currently logged in.

parameters.name: branchId
parameters.description: The id of the branch.

parameters.name: definitionRef
parameters.description: The id of the job definition.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: Job state. if null, all states will be included. (0=New, 1=Running, 2=Succeeded, 3=Error, 4=KillRequest, 5=RestartRequest)

parameters.name: triggerRef
parameters.description: If not null, only jobs triggered by the specified Id will be included.

parameters.name: createdBy
parameters.description: Job Created by. If not null, only jobs created by the specified user will be included.

parameters.name: isDeleted
parameters.description: If true, include only deleted, if false include only not-deleted, if null include all jobs.

parameters.name: continue
parameters.description: An opaque token that encapsulates information how to continue the list request

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: The number of jobs to take.

404.description: The branch or job could not be found.

get.summary: Get a single job by ID

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: The job ID.

404.description: The branch or job could not be found.

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: The job id.

parameters.name: X-CmsApi-Username
parameters.description: The username this transaction is committed for. This must be set for internal access, otherwise, the transaction will be committed as the user who is currently logged in.

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: The job id.

parameters.name: X-CmsApi-Username
parameters.description: The username this transaction is committed for. This must be set for internal access, otherwise, the transaction will be committed as the user who is currently logged in.

get.summary: Get job metrics by Job Id

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: The job ID.

parameters.name: maxItems
parameters.description: Optional parameter to limit the number of metric points returned.

404.description: The job could not be found.

get.summary: Get job progress information by Job Id

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: The job ID.

404.description: The job could not be found.

get.summary: Gets the ids of the job's context objects.

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: The job id.

get.summary: Get job logs by Job Id

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: The job ID.

404.description: The branch or job could not be found.

get.summary: Get job artifacts by Job Id as a ZIP file

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: The job ID.

404.description: The job does not have artifacts.

get.summary: Provides a listing of job artifacts.

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: The job ID.

404.description: The job does not have artifacts.

parameters.name: jobId
parameters.description: The job ID.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: The relative path of the file.

404.description: The job does not have artifacts.

delete.summary: Cancel uploading a file to be used as job input.

parameters.description: The key of the temporary data

parameters.name: deleted
parameters.description: Value of the deleted flag (default: return deleted and undeleted objects)

parameters.description: Include inherited values

parameters.name: continue
parameters.description: The token for the next objects

parameters.description: The number of objects to take

parameters.name: attributes

304.description: The content has not been modified

404.description: The branch or object could not be found

422.description: The object id is not unique

CmsObject.description: A single object with all its values, sorted by attribute, variant and language

values.description: The values, sorted by attribute, variant, language and sort key

CmsObjectMetadata.description: The meta data of an object

apiIdentifier.description: The API identifier, if any. May be null.

typeRef.description: The object ID of the object type of this object.

lastTransaction.description: The ID of the last transaction when local values of this object have been changed on the current branch

deleted.description: True, if the object has been deleted (the value of the attribute "ObjectIsDeleted")

CmsValue.description: A single value of an object

variant.description: The variant ID or 0 if the value is not variant specific

language.description: The language ID or 0 if the value is not language specific

value.description: The scalar value, either a boolean, a number or a string

sortReverse.description: The reverse sort key, if any

unitRef.description: The unit ID or null if the value is not unit specific

comment.description: The transaction comment. May be null.

UpdateBranchResponse.description: Response to an update branch request

createdValues.description: The number of values that have been created

timestamp.description: Get the transaction timestamp as UTC

branchRef.description:
Get the branch this transaction has been committed on.
This may be null, if the transaction did not cover branch-specific data,
e.g. if only object permissions have been changed.

comment.description: The transaction comment. May be null.

DeleteBranchResponse.description: Response to a delete branch request

DeleteBranchRequest.description: Request model for deleting a branch

comment.description: The transaction comment. May be null.

objectRef.description: The object the comment is attached to.

created.description: The date and time when the comment was created.

modified.description: The data and time when the comments was modified.

deleted.description: Specifies if the comment is deleted.

user.description: The user that started the comment.

objectRef.description: The object the comment is attached to.

count.description: The number of comments in the result.

continue.description: There are more items to request if this is not null. Provide this value with the next request as the "continue" parameter.

size.description: Size of the file in bytes.

FileUploadRequest.description: Model for image upload with additional parameters.

extension.description: The files extension. Must be provided for the first request.

commit.description: When true the file will be commited. Has to be set for the last chunk.

created.description: The date and time when the job was created.

modified.description: The data and time when the jobs was modified.

user.description: The user that started the job.

deleted.description: Specifies if the job is deleted.

artifacts.description: If true, the job has artifacts.

scopeRefs.description: The references the job's scope objects.

started.description: The start time of the job.

finished.description: The time hwne the job was finished.

parameters.description: The parameters used to start the job.

name.description: The name of the input parameter.

jobDefinitionId.description: The id of the job definition.

scopeIds.description: The ids of the scope objects.

objIds.description: The ids of the context objects.

parameters.description: The Job Parameters

inputFile.description: Information about the file used as the job input

JobMetrics.description: Represents a single job metric point.

upTime.description: The uptime of the process, in seconds

memory.description: The memory usage in MiB. 1 MiB = 1,048,576 bytes (2^20 bytes)

progress.description: The progress as a percentage (0-1), or null if not available.

count.description: The number of jobs in the result.

continue.description: There are more items to request if this is not null. Provide this value with the next request as the "continue" parameter.

JobState.description: The status of a Nova job

path.description: The relative path of the file.

size.description: Size of the file in bytes

count.description: The number of objects in the list

continue.description: There are more items to request if this is not null. Provide this value with the next request as the "continue" parameter.

createdObjectIds.description: The IDs of objects that have been created

CreateObjectsRequest.description: A list of objects to be created

comment.description: The transaction comment. May be null.

UpdateObjectsResponse.description: Response to an update objects request

updatedObjects.description: The number of objects that have been updated

createdValues.description: The number of values that have been created

UpdateObjectsRequest.description: A list of objects to be updated

comment.description: The transaction comment. May be null.

DeleteObjectsResponse.description: Response to a delete objects request

deletedObjects.description: The number of objects that have been deleted

DeleteObjectsRequest.description: A list of objects to be deleted

comment.description: The transaction comment. May be null.

objectIds.description: The list of object IDs, Guids or API identifiers to be deleted.
